column4: why are there so many security features on this operating system
i thought it is suppose to be user friendly
another good question. my computer can't play mp3, wma, etc.
i try to get into my programs to delete some and it requires a password
i also try to update my time and date and it also requires a password.
which doesn't work
tired sudean as password. does't work
why is my firefox browser stalling. it's not loading up. I tried to download explorer and the executable file would not open
nothing seems to work on this operating system
i thought this is suppose to be tech support
this is all volunteers ;)
and internet explorer doesn't work on windows, never mind ubuntu :)
where are you at now?
I meant, what exactly isn't working, what do you do before it fails to work, so we know how to help you ;)
you should have hit IRC sooner and saved a few of those tries
can you open up a terminal? (right-click on the desktop)
can you type "mozilla-firefox" and press enter/return
and the terminal should give some clues as to what's going wrong
can you now type "pkill mozilla-firefox"
now try mozilla-firefox again
are there no messages appearing in the terminal?
